text: Kɨ fogha gɨfa, ia igharaz darazir akurvaghasa ian naviba dikavigha gɨfa. Ezɨ kɨ zurazurara ian ziaba Masedonian gumazamizibar damazibar da fe. Kɨ kamagh me mɨgei, “Azenir gɨvazim Akaiaba ingangarir kam damuasa biziba akɨrigha gɨfa.” Egha me orazi ia dagɨaba anɨngasa bar ifonge, ezɨ bizir kam Masedonian avɨribar naviba fema me uaghan dagɨabar anɨngasa.
